metadata.synopsis: The Orthon mumble-sings to himself while idle in his lair in the Shar Temple. Occasionally he interrupts the lyrics with frustrated outbursts.This occurs after the ambush scene, where we learn that the song is his contract, and will remain stuck in his head until he fulfills the terms.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Navigate to the Orthon's Lair and resolve SHA_Orthon_TrespassLair peacefully. The Orthon's AD should begin as he starts his post-ambush behaviours.

0.text: Silence all prayers; smother each rite... blasted song!

1.speaker: Yurgir
1.text: Wander Shar's halls; hungry to slay...
